process.name: beulen
process.description: Ermittelt die Beulsteifigkeit einer Struktur an einer bestimmten Stelle. Die Position wird mittels einer Knoten-ID definiert.

variable.description: choose a centrally maintained material database or 'no' if material definitions are provided with abaqus includes

test.name: matchPattern
test.description: testing if given value is one the possible choices.

variable.description: give it a name. 3-50 characters long. letters, figueres and '_'. no spaces.

test.name: matchPattern
test.description: testing if value is min 3 and max 50 characters long and only uses letters, figures and '_'

variable.description: which partype are you going to analyse?

test.name: matchPattern
test.description: testing if given value is one the possible choices.

variable.description: define position of stempel via node id.

test.name: matchPattern
test.description: testing if given value is an integer

variable.description: assessment area of node id. this links to the benchmarks.

test.name: matchPattern
test.description: tests whether given value is an integer

test.name: moreThan
test.description: tests whether given value is min 100

test.name: lessThan
test.description: tests whether given value does not exceed 300

variable.description: if default postprocessing does not allow for a resultset 'vonMisesStrain' with this parameter set to 'true' the generation of this resultset will be forced.
if default postprocessing does not allow for a resultset 'plasticStrain' with this parameter set to 'true' the generation of this resultset will be forced.

file.description: abaqus include file without history data

test.name: sizeGreaterThan
test.description: tests whether file size exceeds a min threshold

test.name: matchPattern
test.description: tests whether file content matches a certain pattern.

step.name: beulen
step.description: Die FE-Struktur wird an 1 Position auf Beulsteifigkeit und Beulfestigkeit untersucht.
